references.paper_title: MVTec AD - A comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset crucial for evaluating 3D anomaly detection methods, shaping the field's research direction.

references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep learning on point sets for 3D classification and segmentation
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces PointNet, a deep learning architecture for processing 3D point cloud data, which is fundamental to many 3D anomaly detection approaches.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a powerful vision-language model that enables zero-shot image classification and is leveraged in this paper for zero-shot 3D anomaly detection.

references.paper_title: Deep learning for anomaly detection: A review
references.reason: This comprehensive review paper provides a broad overview of the field of deep learning for anomaly detection, including the challenges and various approaches, providing a valuable context for the current work.

references.paper_title: AnomalyCLIP: Object-agnostic prompt learning for zero-shot anomaly detection
references.reason: This paper introduces AnomalyCLIP, a related work that utilizes CLIP for zero-shot 2D anomaly detection, informing the methodology of the current paper's 3D adaptation.
